TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IClrObjectFactory

Docs.summary: Activates SOAP-enabled COM+ application proxies from a client.

remarks.format:
## Remarks See <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.ClrObjectFactory> for the default implementation.
<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IClrObjectFactory> is used internally by the .NET Framework. You do not need to use it directly in your code.

MemberSignature.Value: public object CreateFromAssembly (string assembly, string type, string mode);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object CreateFromAssembly(string assembly, string type, string mode) cil managed
Public Function CreateFromAssembly (assembly As String, type As String, mode As String) As Object
public: System::Object ^ CreateFromAssembly(System::String ^ assembly, System::String ^ type, System::String ^ mode);
abstract member CreateFromAssembly : string * string * string -> obj

Docs.param: The name of the assembly to activate.
The name of the type to activate.
Docs.summary: Activates a remote assembly through .NET remoting, using the assembly's configuration file.
Docs.returns: An instance of the representing the type, with culture, arguments, and binding and activation attributes set to , or if the parameter is not found.
Docs.exception: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.

MemberSignature.Value: public object CreateFromMailbox (string Mailbox, string Mode);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object CreateFromMailbox(string Mailbox, string Mode) cil managed
Public Function CreateFromMailbox (Mailbox As String, Mode As String) As Object
public: System::Object ^ CreateFromMailbox(System::String ^ Mailbox, System::String ^ Mode);
abstract member CreateFromMailbox : string * string -> obj

Docs.param: A mailbox on the Web service.
Docs.summary: Activates a remote assembly through .NET remoting, using the remote assembly's mailbox. Currently not implemented; throws a if called.
Docs.returns: This method throws an exception if called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The implementation throws an exception if called.

Docs.exception: Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP) is not implemented.

MemberSignature.Value: public object CreateFromVroot (string VrootUrl, string Mode);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object CreateFromVroot(string VrootUrl, string Mode) cil managed
Public Function CreateFromVroot (VrootUrl As String, Mode As String) As Object
public: System::Object ^ CreateFromVroot(System::String ^ VrootUrl, System::String ^ Mode);
abstract member CreateFromVroot : string * string -> obj

Docs.param: The virtual root URL of the remote object.
Docs.summary: Activates a remote assembly through .NET remoting, using the virtual root URL of the remote assembly.
Docs.returns: An instance of the representing the type, with culture, arguments, and binding and activation attributes set to , or if the assembly identified by the parameter is not found.
Docs.exception: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.
The thread token could not be opened.

MemberSignature.Value: public object CreateFromWsdl (string WsdlUrl, string Mode);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object CreateFromWsdl(string WsdlUrl, string Mode) cil managed
Public Function CreateFromWsdl (WsdlUrl As String, Mode As String) As Object
public: System::Object ^ CreateFromWsdl(System::String ^ WsdlUrl, System::String ^ Mode);
abstract member CreateFromWsdl : string * string -> obj

Docs.param: The WSDL URL of the Web service.
Docs.summary: Activates a remote assembly through .NET remoting, using the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) of the XML Web service.
Docs.returns: An instance of the representing the type, with culture, arguments, and binding and activation attributes set to , or if the assembly identified by the parameter is not found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Processes the WSDL passed in and, if necessary, generates a proxy, then activates the remote object.

Docs.exception: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.
The thread token could not be opened.
